CustomField.description: Take Constituent Name or Organization Name - used for Pledge Receivables Report
CustomField.formula: IF ( ISBLANK( ucinn_ascendv2__Contact__c ), Account.Name, ucinn_ascendv2__Contact__r.FirstName + ' ' + ucinn_ascendv2__Contact__r.LastName + ' ' + ucinn_ascendv2__Contact__r.Suffix )
CustomField.label: Donor Name
